languages.text: "Туда вам и дорога, нелюдь. Даст Всеотец, узрим мы еще не один ваш богохульный мир-корабль, пылающий под нашими выстрелами".
"Good riddance to you, inhuman. Allfather willing, we shall see more than one of your ungodly craftworlds blazing under our shots."
languages.original_text: "Туда вам и дорога, нелюдь. Даст Всеотец, узрим мы еще не один ваш богохульный мир-корабль, пылающий под нашими выстрелами".

traits.locale_text: "Good riddance to you, inhuman. Allfather willing, we shall see more than one of your ungodly craftworlds blazing under our shots."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Good riddance to you, inhuman. Allfather willing, we shall see more than one of your ungodly craftworlds blazing under our shots."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Good riddance to you, inhuman. Allfather willing, we shall see more than one of your ungodly craftworlds blazing under our shots."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “那些该死的异形终于死了。如果全父允许，我们会亲眼看到你们那些亵渎的方舟世界在我们的炮火之下燃烧，而且绝不仅仅是一个。”
languages.original_text: "Good riddance to you, inhuman. Allfather willing, we shall see more than one of your ungodly craftworlds blazing under our shots."

traits.locale_text: “那些该死的异形终于死了。如果全父允许，我们会亲眼看到你们那些亵渎的方舟世界在我们的炮火之下燃烧，而且绝不仅仅是一个。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Bon débarras, non-humaine. Si le Père de Tous le veut, nous verrons plus d'un de vos vaisseaux-mondes brûler sous nos tirs. »
languages.original_text: "Good riddance to you, inhuman. Allfather willing, we shall see more than one of your ungodly craftworlds blazing under our shots."

traits.locale_text: « Bon débarras, inhumaine. Si le Père de Tous le veut, nous verrons plus d'un de vos vaisseaux-mondes brûler sous nos tirs. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Piérdete, inhumana. Si el Padre de todas las cosas quiere, veremos más de vuestros impíos mundos astronave arder bajo nuestros disparos».
languages.original_text: "Good riddance to you, inhuman. Allfather willing, we shall see more than one of your ungodly craftworlds blazing under our shots."

traits.locale_text: «Piérdete, inhumana. Si el Padre de todas las cosas quiere, veremos más de vuestros impíos mundos astronave arder bajo nuestros disparos».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「厄介払いができたな、人外。全知の父の御意志だ、俺たちの砲撃で不敬な方舟を何度も燃え上がらせてやる」
languages.original_text: "Good riddance to you, inhuman. Allfather willing, we shall see more than one of your ungodly craftworlds blazing under our shots."

traits.locale_text: 「厄介払いができたな、人外。全知の父の御意志だ、俺たちの砲撃で不敬な方舟を何度も燃え上がらせてやる」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Auf Nimmerwiedersehen, Unmensch. So der Allvater will, werden wir noch viele Eurer gottlosen Weltenschiffe durch unsere Schüsse verbrennen sehen."
languages.original_text: "Good riddance to you, inhuman. Allfather willing, we shall see more than one of your ungodly craftworlds blazing under our shots."

traits.locale_text: "Auf Nimmerwiedersehen, Unmensch. So der Allvater will, werden wir noch viele Eurer gottlosen Weltenschiffe durch unsere Schüsse verbrennen sehen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Good riddance to you, inhuman. Allfather willing, we shall see more than one of your ungodly craftworlds blazing under our shots."

languages.text: "Uğurlar olsun insan dışı. Yücebaba'nın izniyle günahkâr gemidünyalarınızın ateşimizle kül olduğunu göreceğiz."
languages.original_text: "Good riddance to you, inhuman. Allfather willing, we shall see more than one of your ungodly craftworlds blazing under our shots."

traits.locale_text: "Uğurlar olsun insan dışı. Yücebaba'nın izniyle dinsiz gemidünyalarınızın bizim ateşimizle kül olduğunu göreceğiz."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
